attributes.action: Remove Lord Kilclooney from House of Lords
attributes.additional_details: We cannot allow people of privelage to shane the country with outdated , disgusting comments on race
attributes.background: Lord Kilclooney referencing incumbent US VP as the Indian is not only Racist but damaging to upcoming trade talks.

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions that call for people to lose their job or a title.
